suite.name: TS 05

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Set Screenshot Directory
kw.doc: Sets the directory for captured screenshots.

test.name: TS_05-01 – Upload souboru s navrhem PCB

kw.name: Should Be True
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Scroll Element Into View
kw.doc: Scrolls the element identified by ``locator`` into view.

kw.name: Choose File
kw.doc: Inputs the ``file_path`` into the file input field ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Attribute Value Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies element identified by ``locator`` contains expected attribute value.

kw.name: Element Attribute Value Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies element identified by ``locator`` contains expected attribute value.

kw.name: Run Keywords
kw.doc: Executes all the given keywords in a sequence.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Reload Page
kw.doc: Simulates user reloading page.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.
